articles.title: Larry Nassar loses last appeal in sexual assault scandal
articles.description: Larry Nassar's final appeal was rejected by a Michigan court. The disgraced former sports doctor who was sentenced to decades in prison for sexually assaulting gymnasts, argued he was treated unfairly at his 2018 trial.
articles.content: DETROIT -- The Michigan Supreme Court on Friday rejected a final appeal from sports doctor Larry Nassar, who was sentenced to decades in prison for sexually assaulting gymnasts, including Olympic med… [+2008 chars]

articles.title: Rafael Nadal confirms intention to compete at Wimbledon for first time in three years
articles.description: Rafael Nadal confirmed on Friday that he intends to play at Wimbledon for the first time in three years.

articles.title: Vince McMahon steps aside as WWE chairman, CEO amid investigation into alleged hush money payment
articles.description: Vince McMahon is stepping aside from his role as CEO and chairman of World Wrestling Entertainment during an investigation into alleged hush money he agreed to pay to a former employee over an alleged affair.

articles.title: Golden State Warriors finish off Boston Celtics for fourth NBA title in eight years
articles.description: Two years after finishing with the NBA's worst record, the Golden State Warriors are back on top, finishing off the Boston Celtics in six games to capture their fourth title since 2015.
articles.content:
BOSTON -- For the fourth time in eight years, the Golden State Warriors have been crowned champions, as they eliminated the Celtics 103-90 on Thursday night in Game 6 of the NBA Finals.
